Specifically, in the book Known and Unknown, Donald Rumsfeld recalls taking issue with Bush's infamous`` Mission Accomplished'' speech, specifically the line in which the president said, The transition from dictatorship will take time, but it is worth every effort. Our coaltition will stay until our work is done. Donald Rumsfeld reacted:`` That was not the way I understood our plan.
